title: Revolution WatchFace
summary: Animated modern clock for Android Wear. It is also simple, fun and free.
description: Revolution Watch Face offers you to enjoy wherever you are the animated clock present on your favorite French internet box.It offers a clear interface that will delight all Android Wear devices users.This watchface allows you to scroll through the minutes in a fluid and modern way.It can be configured directly from the watch or the phone to suit individual tastes.Compatible with all Android Wear watches, square or round.
descriptionHTML:
Revolution Watch Face offers you to enjoy wherever you are the animated clock present on your favorite French internet box.
It offers a clear interface that will delight all Android Wear devices users.
This watchface allows you to scroll through the minutes in a fluid and modern way.
It can be configured directly from the watch or the phone to suit individual tastes.

Compatible with all Android Wear watches, square or round.
comments: Absolutely looooove this face, could you please have the option to display watch battery. Thank you Dev
Simple and elegant Most underrated but beautiful and simple facewatch must try it !

Big ol' simple clock watch face Glad to see one of my favorite pebble watch faces making the move to wear!  Just need to that date bar at the bottom for it to be complete. Still love it though. Straightforward and simple here.
Not working It freezes and does not tell time. Useless

recentChanges: Add eco mode to reduce battery consumption in ambient mode.
